title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 154.3 - Completion of continuing property records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 154.3 - Completion of continuing property records

State Regulations

Every electric corporation or gas and electric corporation
affected by this Part shall file on or before February 1, 1937, a statement
setting forth the continuing property record units proposed to be used in its
continuing property record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
154.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
